doc.field: - Atlantic City Electric Co said it will redeem all of its outstanding 5-7/8 pct cumulative convertible preferred stock. The stock will be redeemed April 30 at the scheduled redemption price of 101.50 dlrs a share plus accrued and unpaid dividends. The shares are also convertible until the redemption date into common stock at the rate of 3.5 common shares for each preferred share. The company has 10,855 of the 5-7/8 pct preferred shares outstanding, it said.
